mapper.select: SELECT ID, UPCYCLING_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_DETAIL_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_EMAIL, UPCYCLING_PHONE, UPCYCLING_DATE, UPCYCLING_SIZE_SMALL, UPCYCLING_SIZE_MEDIUM, UPCYCLING_SIZE_LARGE, UPCYCLING_MATERIALS, UPCYCLING_IMG_NAME, UPCYCLING_IMG_PATH, UPCYCLING_SIGNIFICANT, UPCYCLING_STATUS, USER_ID FROM TBL_UPCYCLING

SELECT ID, UPCYCLING_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_DETAIL_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_EMAIL, UPCYCLING_PHONE, UPCYCLING_DATE, UPCYCLING_SIZE_SMALL, UPCYCLING_SIZE_MEDIUM, UPCYCLING_SIZE_LARGE, UPCYCLING_MATERIALS, UPCYCLING_IMG_NAME, UPCYCLING_IMG_PATH, UPCYCLING_SIGNIFICANT, UPCYCLING_STATUS, USER_ID FROM TBL_UPCYCLING WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT TUC.ID, UPCYCLING_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_DETAIL_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_EMAIL, UPCYCLING_PHONE, UPCYCLING_DATE, UPCYCLING_SIZE_SMALL, UPCYCLING_SIZE_MEDIUM, UPCYCLING_SIZE_LARGE, UPCYCLING_MATERIALS, UPCYCLING_IMG_NAME, UPCYCLING_IMG_PATH, UPCYCLING_SIGNIFICANT, UPCYCLING_STATUS, TBU.ID AS USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_UPCYCLING TUC JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TUC.USER_ID = TBU.ID WHERE TUC.UPCYCLING_STATUS = '미신청' ORDER BY TUC.UPCYCLING_DATE DESC

SELECT TUC.ID, UPCYCLING_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_DETAIL_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_EMAIL, UPCYCLING_PHONE, UPCYCLING_DATE, UPCYCLING_SIZE_SMALL, UPCYCLING_SIZE_MEDIUM, UPCYCLING_SIZE_LARGE, UPCYCLING_MATERIALS, UPCYCLING_IMG_NAME, UPCYCLING_IMG_PATH, UPCYCLING_SIGNIFICANT, UPCYCLING_STATUS, TBU.ID AS USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_UPCYCLING TUC JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TUC.USER_ID = TBU.ID WHERE TUC.ID = #{id}
